```jsx
function App() {

  useEffect(() => {

            className="bg white p 6 rounded shadow hover:shadow lg transition"

              <img
                src={proj.image.asset.url}
                alt={proj.title}
                className="w full h 48 object cover rounded mb 4"

              target="_blank"
              rel="noopener noreferrer"
              className="text blue 600 underline"
            >
              View Project
            </a>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  )
}

export default App
```

```jsx
export default function Navbar() {

  return (
    <>
      <nav className="flex justify between items center p 4 fixed w full top 0 z 50 bg white shadow">
        <h1 className="text xl font bold">Trump Tower</h1>
        <button onClick={() => setIsOpen(true)} className="text xl">â˜°</button>

              initial={{ x: 300 }}
              animate={{ x: 0 }}
              exit={{ x: 300 }}
              transition={{ type: "spring", stiffness: 300, damping: 30 }}
            >
              <button onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)} className="mb 4 text lg font bold">âœ•</button>
              <ul className="space y 4">
                <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Residences</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Gallery</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
              </ul>
            </motion.div>
          </>
        )}
      </AnimatePresence>
    </>
  )
}
```

### âœ… File: `Navbar.jsx` (á»Ÿ `src/pages/Navbar.jsx`)

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [open, setOpen] = useState(false)

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg gray 100">
      {/* NÃºt menu */}
      <button
        className="fixed top 4 left 4 z 50 text 3xl font bold"
        onClick={() => setOpen(!open)}
      >
        â˜°
      </button>

      {/* Sidebar overlay */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {open && (
          <motion.div
            initial={{ x: ' 100%' }}
            animate={{ x: 0 }}
            exit={{ x: ' 100%' }}
            transition={{ type: 'spring', stiffness: 300, damping: 30 }}
            className="fixed top 0 left 0 w 64 h full bg black text white p 6 z 40"
          >
            <h2 className="text 2xl font semibold mb 6">Sidebar Menu</h2>
            <ul className="space y 4">
              <li><a href="/" className="hover:underline">Home</a></li>
              <li><a href="/about" className="hover:underline">About</a></li>
              <li><a href="/services" className="hover:underline">Services</a></li>
              <li><a href="/contact" className="hover:underline">Contact</a></li>
            </ul>
          </motion.div>
        )}
      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}
```

 

### âœ… Nhá»› cÃ i `framer motion` náº¿u chÆ°a:


```jsx
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)

  const toggleItem = (item) => {

  }

  return (
```

```jsx
      {/* NÃºt â˜° hiá»‡n khi menu Ä‘Ã³ng */}

      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 bg black text white z 50 p 6 shadow lg"
      >
        {/* NÃºt Ä‘Ã³ng âŒ */}
        <button
          className="absolute top 4 right 4 text white text 2xl"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        >
          Ã—
        </button>

        <div className="space y 4">
          {/* Má»¥c 1: About */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItem === 'about' ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItem === 'about' && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Má»¥c 2: Residences */}
```

### âœ… File `Navbar.jsx` Ä‘Ã£ fix hoÃ n chá»‰nh:

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [showMenuIcon, setShowMenuIcon] = useState(true)
  const [openItem, setOpenItem] = useState(null)

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItem(openItem === item ? null : item)
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg white">
      {/* NÃºt â˜° chá»‰ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ khi sidebar Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Ã³ng hoÃ n toÃ n */}
      {showMenuIcon && !isOpen && (
        <button
          className="fixed top 5 right 5 z 50 p 2 text white bg black rounded"
          onClick={() => {
            setIsOpen(true)
            setShowMenuIcon(false) // áº©n ngay khi báº¯t Ä‘áº§u má»Ÿ
          }}
        >
          â˜°
        </button>
      )}

      {/* Overlay Ä‘en khi má»Ÿ menu */}
      {isOpen && (
        <div
          className="fixed inset 0 bg black bg opacity 50 z 40"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        />
      )}

      {/* Menu trÆ°á»£t tá»« pháº£i sang */}
      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        onAnimationComplete={() => {
          // Sau khi animation hoÃ n táº¥t
          if (!isOpen) {
            setShowMenuIcon(true) // hiá»‡n láº¡i icon â˜°
          }
        }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 bg black text white z 50 p 6 shadow lg"
      >
        {/* NÃºt Ä‘Ã³ng âŒ */}
        <button
          className="absolute top 4 right 4 text white text 2xl"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        >
          Ã—
        </button>

        <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6">Menu</h1>

        <div className="space y 4">
          {/* Má»¥c About */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItem === 'about' ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItem === 'about' && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Má»¥c Residences */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItem === 'residence' ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItem === 'residence' && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>Floor Plans</p>
                <p>Amenities</p>
                <p>Gallery</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

|    |     |
| NÃºt â˜° xuáº¥t hiá»‡n sá»›m khi sidebar Ä‘ang kÃ©o vÃ o | T dÃ¹ng `showMenuIcon` Ä‘á»ƒ kiá»ƒm soÃ¡t viá»‡c hiá»ƒn thá»‹ icon nÃ y. |

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react';
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion';

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
  const [openItem, setOpenItem] = useState(null);

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItem(openItem === item ? null : item);
  };

  const toggleMenu = () => {
    setIsOpen(!isOpen);
    if (!isOpen) setOpenItem(null); // Reset submenu khi má»Ÿ láº¡i
  };

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg gray 100">
      {/* Menu icon */}
      {!isOpen && (
        <button
          onClick={toggleMenu}
          className="absolute top 6 right 6 z 50 text 3xl font bold text black"
        >
          â˜°
        </button>
      )}

      {/* Sidebar */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            initial={{ x: '100%' }}
            animate={{ x: 0 }}
            exit={{ x: '100%' }}
            transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
            className="fixed top 0 right 0 w 80 h full bg black text white p 6 z 40"
          >
            {/* Close button */}
            <button
              onClick={toggleMenu}
              className="absolute top 6 right 6 text 2xl"
            >
              âœ•
            </button>

            <h1 className="text 3xl font bold mb 6">Menu</h1>

            <div className="space y 4">
              {/* About */}
              <div>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
                  className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
                >
                  <span className="text xl">About</span>
                  <span
                    className={`transform transition transform ${
                      openItem === 'about' ? 'rotate 45' : ''
                    }`}
                  >
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                {openItem === 'about' && (
                  <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                    <p>History</p>
                    <p>Vision</p>
                    <p>Leadership</p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>

              {/* Residences */}
              <div>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
                  className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
                >
                  <span className="text xl">Residences</span>
                  <span
                    className={`transform transition transform ${
                      openItem === 'residence' ? 'rotate 45' : ''
                    }`}
                  >
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                {openItem === 'residence' && (
                  <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                    <p>Floor Plans</p>
                    <p>Amenities</p>
                    <p>Gallery</p>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>
          </motion.div>
        )}
      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  );
}
```

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [show_sidebar, setshow_sidebar] = useState(true)
  const [openItem, setOpenItem] = useState(null)

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItem(openItem === item ? null : item)
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {/* NÃºt â˜° chá»‰ hiá»ƒn thá»‹ khi sidebar Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Ã³ng hoÃ n toÃ n */}
      {show_sidebar && !isOpen && (
        <button
          className="relative z 50 p 2 text white bg black rounded"
          onClick={() => {
            setIsOpen(true)
            setshow_sidebar(false) // áº©n ngay khi báº¯t Ä‘áº§u má»Ÿ
          }}
        >
          â˜°
        </button>
      )}

      {/* Overlay Ä‘en khi má»Ÿ menu */}
      {isOpen && (
        <div
          className="fixed bg black z 40"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        />
      )}

      {/* Menu trÆ°á»£t tá»« pháº£i sang */}
      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        onAnimationComplete={() => {
          // Sau khi animation hoÃ n táº¥t
          if (!isOpen) {
            setshow_sidebar(true) // hiá»‡n láº¡i icon â˜°
          }
        }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 bg black text white z 50 p 6 shadow lg"
      >
        {/* NÃºt Ä‘Ã³ng âŒ */}
        <button
          className="absolute top 4 right 4 text white text 2xl"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        >
          Ã—
        </button>

        <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6">Menu</h1>

        <div className="space y 4">
          {/* Má»¥c About */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItem === 'about' ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItem === 'about' && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Má»¥c Residences */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItem === 'residence' ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItem === 'residence' && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>Floor Plans</p>
                <p>Amenities</p>
                <p>Gallery</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [show_icon, setshow_icon] = useState(true)
  const [openItem, setOpenItem] = useState(null)

    setOpenItem(openItem === item ? null : item)

          // Sau khi animation hoÃ n táº¥t

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'
import { client } from './sanity'

function Sanity() {
  const [projects, setProjects] = useState([])
    const [sidebar, setsidebar] = useState(false)

  useEffect(() => {
    client
      .fetch(`*[_type == "project"]{
        title,
        description,
        url,
        image {
          asset  > {
            url
          }
        }
      }`)
      .then((data) => {
        setProjects(data)
      })
      .catch((err) => {
        console.error('âŒ Fetch error:', err.message)
      })
  }, [])

  return (
    <div className="p 10 min h screen">
      <h1 className="text 3xl font bold mb 10 text center">ğŸŒŸ My Projects</h1>

    
      <ul className="grid grid cols 1 md:grid cols 2 lg:grid cols 3 gap 10">



        {projects.map((p, i) => (
          <li key={i} className="bg gray 700 p 6 rounded hover:shadow lg text white text center flex justify center flex col">
            <h2 className="text xl font semibold mb 2">{p.title}</h2>
            {p.image?.asset?.url && (
              <img
                src={p.image.asset.url}
                alt={p.title}
                className="max h [190px] min w 52 object cover mb 4 max w full aspect 3/2"
              />
            )}
            <p className="mb 2">{p.description}</p>
<motion.div>
  <a
    href={p.url}
    target="_blank"
    rel="noopener noreferrer"
    className="text blue 300 underline font bold"
  >
    View Project
  </a>
</motion.div>

          </li>
        ))}

      </ul>
    </div>
  )
}

export default Sanity

```jsx
import { motion, AnimatePresence, useViewportScroll } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [showIcon, setShowIcon] = useState(true)
  const [bgSolid, setBgSolid] = useState(false)
  const { scrollY } = useViewportScroll()

  useEffect(() => {
    return scrollY.onChange(y => setBgSolid(y > 50))
  }, [scrollY])

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen">
      {showIcon && (
        <button
          className="fixed top 4 left 4 z 50 p 2 bg black text white rounded"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(true)}
        >â˜°</button>
      )}

      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <>
            <motion.div
              className="fixed inset 0 bg black bg opacity 50 z 40"
              initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
              animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
              exit={{ opacity: 0 }}
              onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
            />
            <motion.div
              className={`fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 z 50 p 6 shadow lg ${bgSolid ? 'bg white' : 'bg transparent'}`}
              initial={{ x: '100%' }}
              animate={{ x: 0 }}
              exit={{ x: '100%' }}
              transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.3 }}
              onAnimationComplete={() => {
                if (!isOpen) setShowIcon(true)
              }}
            >
              <button
                className="absolute top 4 right 4 text 2xl"
                onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
              >Ã—</button>
              {/* ... Menu items ... */}
            </motion.div>
          </>
        )}
      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}
```

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Sidebar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [show_icon, setShowIcon] = useState(true)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {show_icon && !isOpen && (
        <button
          className="relative z 50 p 2 text white bg black rounded"
          onClick={() => {
            setIsOpen(true)
          }}
        >
          â˜°
        </button>
      )}

      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        onAnimationComplete={() => {
          if (!isOpen) {
            setShowIcon(true)
          }
        }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 bg black text white p 6 shadow lg">
            <button
              className="absolute top 4 right 4 text white text 2xl"
              onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}>
              Ã—
            </button>

            <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6">Menu</h1>
        <div className="space y 4">
          {/* About Section */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.about && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Residences Section */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.residence && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>Floor Plans</p>
                <p>Amenities</p>
                <p>Gallery</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}

### âœ… `Navbar.jsx` (báº£n Ä‘Ã£ chá»‰nh)

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Sidebar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [showIcon, setShowIcon] = useState(true)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {showIcon && !isOpen && (
        <button
          className="relative z 50 p 2 text white bg black rounded"
          onClick={() => {
            setIsOpen(true)
            setShowIcon(false)
          }}
        >
          â˜°
        </button>
      )}

      {/* Sidebar */}
      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.5 }}
        onAnimationComplete={() => {
          if (!isOpen) setShowIcon(true)
        }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 64 bg black text white p 6 shadow lg z 50"
      >
        {/* Close button */}
        <button
          className="absolute top 4 right 4 text white text 2xl"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        >
          Ã—
        </button>

        <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6">Menu</h1>

        <div className="space y 6">
          {/* ABOUT */}
          <motion.div
            initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 100 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
            transition={{ delay: 0.2 }}
          >
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.about && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </motion.div>

          {/* RESIDENCES */}
          <motion.div
            initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 100 }}
            animate={{ opacity: 1, x: 0 }}
            transition={{ delay: 0.4 }}
          >
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.residence && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>Floor Plans</p>
                <p>Amenities</p>
                <p>Gallery</p>
              </div>
            )}
          </motion.div>
        </div>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

| `initial={{ opacity: 0, x: 100 }}` | Báº¯t Ä‘áº§u tá»« pháº£i vÃ  má» |

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion } from 'framer motion'

export default function Sidebar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {/* Hamburger Icon */}
      {!isOpen && (
        <button
          className="fixed top 4 right 4 z 50 w 10 h 10 flex flex col justify between items center"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(true)}
        >
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg black transition transform origin center rotate 0" />
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg black transition opacity" />
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg black transition transform origin center rotate 0" />
        </button>
      )}

      {/* Menu slide in */}
      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 72 bg black text white z 50 p 6 shadow lg"
      >
        {/* Close Icon (X) xáº¿p hÃ¬nh */}
        <button
          className="absolute top 4 right 4 z 50 w 10 h 10 flex flex col justify between items center"
          onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
        >
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg white rotate 45 translate y [8px] transition transform" />
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg white opacity 0" />
          <span className="block w full h [2px] bg white  rotate 45  translate y [8px] transition transform" />
        </button>

        <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6 mt 16">Menu</h1>

        <div className="space y 4">
          {/* About Section */}
          <div>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.about && (
              <div className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300">
                <p>History</p>
```

  hidden: {},
  show: {
    transition: {
```js
      staggerChildren: 0.15
    }
  }
}
```

```jsx
  hidden: { opacity: 0, x: 20 },
  show: { opacity: 1, x: 0 }
}

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {/* Icon menu 3 gáº¡ch chuyá»ƒn dáº¥u X */}
      <button
        className="fixed top 4 right 4 z 50 w 10 h 10 flex items center justify center"

          ${isOpen ? 'rotate 45 bg white translate y 0' : ' translate y [6px]'}`} />
        <span className={`absolute w [20px] h [2px] bg black transition duration 300 
          ${isOpen ? 'opacity 0' : 'opacity 100'}`} />
        <span className={`absolute w [20px] h [2px] bg black transition duration 300 
          ${isOpen ? ' rotate 45 bg white translate y 0' : 'translate y [6px]'}`} />
      </button>

      {/* Sidebar */}
      <motion.div
        initial={{ x: '100%' }}
        animate={{ x: isOpen ? 0 : '100%' }}
        transition={{ type: 'tween', duration: 0.4 }}
        className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 72 bg black text white z 40 p 6 shadow lg"
      >
        <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6 mt 16">Menu</h1>

        <motion.div
          variants={menuContainer}
          initial="hidden"
          animate="show"
          className="space y 6"
        >
          {/* About */}
          <motion.div variants={menuItem}>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">About</span>
              <span className={`transition transform ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.about && (
              <motion.div
                variants={menuItem}
                className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300"
              >
                <p>History</p>
                <p>Vision</p>
                <p>Leadership</p>
              </motion.div>
            )}
          </motion.div>

          {/* Residences */}
          <motion.div variants={menuItem}>
            <button
              onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
              className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
            >
              <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
              <span className={`transition transform ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                +
              </span>
            </button>
            {openItems.residence && (
              <motion.div
                variants={menuItem}
                className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300"
              >
                <p>Floor Plans</p>
                <p>Amenities</p>
                <p>Gallery</p>
              </motion.div>
            )}
          </motion.div>
        </motion.div>
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  )
}
```

  Hiá»‡u á»©ng **má»Ÿ tá»«ng má»¥c "About", "Residences"** vá»›i **Framer Motion stagger**  
  Icon menu **xáº¿p hÃ¬nh thÃ nh chá»¯ X**
  Sidebar **trÆ°á»£t ra tá»« pháº£i â†’ trÃ¡i**
  CÃ¡c má»¥c con **fade + slide lÃªn tá»«ng cÃ¡i má»™t**

 

### âœ… File `Navbar.jsx` Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ (giá»‘ng masterise)

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.4,
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.1,
      }
    },
    exit: { x: '100%' }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }
  }

  return (
    <div className="relative min h screen bg pink 200">
      {/* Hamburger menu icon */}
      <button
        className="fixed top 4 right 4 z 50 w 10 h 10 flex items center justify center"
        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
      >
        <span className={`absolute w [20px] h [2px] bg black transition all duration 300 
          ${isOpen ? 'rotate 45 translate y [6px] bg white' : ' translate y [6px]'}`} />
        <span className={`absolute w [20px] h [2px] bg black transition all duration 300 
          ${isOpen ? 'opacity 0' : 'opacity 100'}`} />
        <span className={`absolute w [20px] h [2px] bg black transition all duration 300 
          ${isOpen ? ' rotate 45  translate y [6px] bg white' : 'translate y [6px]'}`} />
      </button>

      {/* Sidebar with framer motion */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            variants={sidebarVariants}
            initial="hidden"
            animate="visible"
            exit="exit"
            className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 72 bg black text white z 40 p 6 shadow lg"
          >
            <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6 mt 16">Menu</h1>

            <motion.div variants={childVariants} className="space y 4">
              {/* About section */}
              <div>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}
                  className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
                >
                  <span className="text lg">About</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.about && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="about content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                      className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300"
                    >
                      <p>History</p>
                      <p>Vision</p>
                      <p>Leadership</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </div>

              {/* Residences section */}
              <div>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('residence')}
                  className="flex items center justify between w full text left"
                >
                  <span className="text lg">Residences</span>
                  <span className={`transform transition transform ${openItems.residence ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.residence && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="residence content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}
                      className="ml 4 mt 2 space y 2 text sm text gray 300"
                    >
                      <p>Floor Plans</p>
                      <p>Amenities</p>
                      <p>Gallery</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </div>
            </motion.div>
          </motion.div>
        )}
      </AnimatePresence>
    </div>
  )
}
```

 

### âœ… CÃ i thÆ° viá»‡n cáº§n thiáº¿t:

```bash
npm install framer motion
```

Go chiáº¿n há»¯u! MÃ¬nh Ä‘ang **clone real estate site** Ä‘Ãºng nghÄ©a luÃ´n rá»“i Ä‘Ã³. ğŸ—ï¸ğŸ’¥
user
chiáº¿n há»¯u Æ¡i fix láº¡i Ä‘i lÃºc ra thÃ¬ cháº­m lÃºc vÃ´ thÃ¬ nhanh quÃ¡, chÆ°a ká»ƒ cÃ¡i dáº¥u x bá»‹ biáº¿n thÃ nh <, t muá»‘n cÃ¡i about lÃªn tr r cÃ¡i residences theo sau r khi báº¥m vÃ o cÃ¡i about hay residence láº¡i ko pháº£i báº­t ra hay show lÃªn mÃ  hiá»‡u á»©ng nÃ³ nhÃ¨ nháº¹ thÃ´i, ko kiá»ƒu báº­t ra nhanh quÃ¡

Chiáº¿n há»¯u Æ¡i, Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  báº£n **Ä‘Ã£ fix hoÃ n toÃ n** theo yÃªu cáº§u:

 

### âœ… Nhá»¯ng gÃ¬ Ä‘Ã£ fix:
  â— **Ra â€“ vÃ o mÆ°á»£t nhÆ° nhau** (`easeInOut`, duration Ä‘á»“ng Ä‘á»u)
  âŒ Dáº¥u **X bá»‹ lá»‡ch thÃ nh "<"** â†’ Ä‘Ã£ **fix icon xáº¿p hÃ¬nh mÆ°á»£t vÃ  Ä‘á»u**
  âœ… `About` vÃ  `Residences` **má»Ÿ ra tá»« tá»«, nhÃ¨ nháº¹**, **khÃ´ng báº­t cÃ¡i bá»¥p**
  âœ… `About` hiá»‡n trÆ°á»›c â†’ rá»“i `Residences` trá»… 0.2s â†’ **staggerChildren**

 

### âœ… Code full `Navbar.jsx`:

```jsx
import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut',
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.2
      }
    },
    exit: {
      x: '100%',
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut'
      }
    }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } },
```

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,

    }))

  const sidebarVariants = {

import { useState } from 'react'
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer motion'

export default function Navbar() {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState({
    about: true,
    residence: true
  })

  const toggleItem = (item) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [item]: !prev[item]
    }))
  }

  const sidebarVariants = {
    hidden: { x: '100%' },
    visible: {
      x: 0,
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut',
        when: 'beforeChildren',
        staggerChildren: 0.2
      }
    },
    exit: {
      x: '100%',
      transition: {
        type: 'tween',
        duration: 0.5,
        ease: 'easeInOut'
      }
    }
  }

  const childVariants = {
    hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 },
    visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } },
    exit: { opacity: 0, y: 30, transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeIn' } }
  }

  return (
    <div className="flex justify between items center">

        <img src="/logo.png"/>
   
   <button
  className="fixed top 4 right 4 z 50 w 10 h 10 relative"
  onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}>

  {/* Line 1 */}
  <span className={`absolute w [24px] h [2px] bg white left 1/2 top [10px]
    transform transition transform duration 300 origin center
    ${isOpen ? 'rotate 45 translate x [ 50%] translate y [6px]' : 'translate x [ 50%]'}`}
  />

  {/* Line 2 */}
  <span className={`absolute w [24px] h [2px] bg white left 1/2 top [18px]
    transform transition opacity duration 300 origin center
    ${isOpen ? 'opacity 0' : 'opacity 100 translate x [ 50%]'}`}
  />

  {/* Line 3 */}
  <span className={`absolute w [24px] h [2px] bg white left 1/2 top [26px]
    transform transition transform duration 300 origin center
    ${isOpen ? ' rotate 45 translate x [ 50%] translate y [ 6px]' : 'translate x [ 50%]'}`}
  />
</button>

      {/* Sidebar */}
      <AnimatePresence>
        {isOpen && (
          <motion.div
            variants={sidebarVariants}
            initial="hidden"
            animate="visible"
            exit="exit"
            className="fixed top 0 right 0 h full w 72 bg black text white p 6 shadow lg"
          >
            <h1 className="text 2xl font bold mb 6 mt 16">Menu</h1>

            <motion.div variants={childVariants} className="space y 4">
              {/* About */}
              <motion.div variants={childVariants}>
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem('about')}

                  <span className={`transform transition transform duration 300 ${openItems.about ? 'rotate 45' : ''}`}>
                    +
                  </span>
                </button>
                <AnimatePresence>
                  {openItems.about && (
                    <motion.div
                      key="about content"
                      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
                      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
                      transition={{ duration: 0.2, ease: 'easeOut' }}

                    >
                      <p>History</p>
                      <p>Vision</p>
                      <p>Leadership</p>
                    </motion.div>
                  )}
                </AnimatePresence>
              </motion.div>

```jsx
import 'swiper/css/navigation'
import { Navigation, Autoplay } from 'swiper'

export default function Gallery() {
  return (
    <Swiper
      modules={[Navigation, Autoplay]}
      spaceBetween={30}
      slidesPerView={1}
      loop={true}
      autoplay={{ delay: 3000 }}
      navigation
      breakpoints={{
        640: { slidesPerView: 2 },
        1024: { slidesPerView: 3 }

        <SwiperSlide key={i}>
          <img src={src} className="w full object cover" />
        </SwiperSlide>
      ))}
    </Swiper>
  )
}
```
